Starting the Project Tab

Nov 19, 2025

Initally I wanted a hub page to link all my different projects, however I learnt of Jekyll and decide to learn how it works. As a side effect this blog is created.

During my past project I have not kept any record and I found them quite regrettable.

This segment will cover any personal project, both big and small, and serve as a record to any development.
